wikipedia_page.main: Johnny Holt  (10 April 1865 – 1937) was an English professional footballer who played in twenty-one of Everton's twenty-two game Football League title winning side of 1890–91.

response: *Johnny Holt, also known as Jack Holt (born 1865), Everton, Reading and England footballer
* Johnny Holt (1865–1937), English footballer for Everton
